title: Drawing, "Project for the decoration of a vertical panel", ca. 1775
medium: Graphite, Pen and black ink on paper with brush and wash
provenance: Collection of Léon Decloux. Ex-Coll. of Hippolyte Destailleur (sold, Paris, May 19, 1896 for 215 francs.)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: A candelabrum used as a vase, a medallion and a thyrsus surrounded by floral motifs and framed by mouldings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Project for the decoration of a vertical panel", ca. 1775.
ca. 1775. Graphite, Pen and black ink on paper with brush and wash. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-31.
